title: On the completeness of the space $\mathcal{O}_C$
abstract:
We give a new proof of the completeness of the space $\mathcal{O}_C$ by
applying a criterion of compact regularity for the isomorphic sequence space
$\lim_{k\rightarrow} (s\hat \otimes (\ell^\infty)_{-k})$. Along the way we show
that the strong dual of any quasinormable Fr\'echet space is a compactly
regular $\mathcal{LB}$-space. Finally, we prove that
$\lim_{k\rightarrow}(E_k\hat \otimes_\iota F) = (\lim_{k\rightarrow} E_k) \hat
\otimes_\iota F$ if the inductive limit $\lim_{k \rightarrow}(E_k \hat
\otimes_\iota F)$ is compactly regular.
